publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3633.1 Tommy Sheridan: Interests of Members of the Scottish Parliament Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3633) in the name of Brian Adam, insert at end "but, in so doing, considers that it should cover homes which have been purchased under the Parliament’s accommodation allowance and that amendments should be brought forward at Stage 2 to achieve this purpose." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
